title: [K-12] Immersive Virtual Reality Science Inquiry Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science concept comprehension and basic digital device operation skills
context.additional_context: VR-based science experiment simulations and project execution using personal devices.

learning_goals: Learners will be able to explain the scientific properties of substances by manipulating molecular structures and simulating chemical reactions in a VR environment.
Learners will be able to structure scientific reasoning processes into three or more stages by analyzing virtual experiment data.
Learners will be able to complete a complex science problem-solving project by dividing roles with peers in a collaborative VR platform.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
